title: 4ever punk
abstract: one hour of punk music, encompassing many different styles
description:
Let's rock with the rebellious, radical and revolutionary rhymes and rhythms!

Listen and celebrate to various kinds of punk music from all over the world.

I am punk-rocker at heart since my early youth and simply love the music!
This love is what I want to share with you acoustically.

persons.name: DJ Baba Grande
persons.biography: I love the music. I play the music. For you.
